projects-view-no-workspace-content:
No workspace open, create new or open existing to get started.
[Create new](command:projects.new)
[Open existing](command:projects.openExisting)
To learn more about SQL Database projects [read our docs](https://aka.ms/azuredatastudio-sqlprojects).
projects-view-no-project-content:
No projects found in current workspace.
[Create new](command:projects.new)
[Open existing](command:projects.openExisting)
To learn more about SQL Database projects [read our docs](https://aka.ms/azuredatastudio-sqlprojects).
projects.defaultProjectSaveLocation: Full path to folder where new projects are saved by default.
